alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 22 at 10:27AM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT SUNDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Bitterroot/Sapphire Mountains. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Prepare for slick road conditions and reduced visibility during periods of moderate to heavy snow. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...Backcountry enthusiasts and hunters should be prepared for wintry conditions and the potential for hypothermia if caught in a storm unprepared.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
